rationale: Note documents missed warfarin dose, daughter’s pill-organizer intervention, and describes current adherence (“able to attend frequent checks”).
Bleeding/bruising review present; mentions “frequent monitoring,” but no specific INR value, target range, or scheduled date.
Clearly states daughter created pill organizer and provides transportation to monitoring visits, addressing both SDoH elements.
No reference to patient’s CKD or how it affects anticoagulation decisions.
Entry is brief and focused; contains no redundant problem lists or transcript filler, so only minimal penalty warranted.
Fails to outline target INR, next check date, or who will follow results; represents a substantial omission.
